quote: People wait all week for Friday, all year for summer, all life for happiness
author: Happiness

quote: Life is about learning from the past, trusting your intuition going forward, taking chances, finding moments of happiness, and realizing everything is simply a lesson that happens for a reason.
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
author: A. Nielsen

quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance; The wise grows it under his feet.
author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: Children are one of the greatest lessons in happiness, constantly challenging us to enjoy the moment, as the next one will not be the same.
author: Happiness

quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world. Someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
author: Allan K. Chalmers

quote: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The key to happiness is good health and a bad memory
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Well-being and happiness never appeared to me as an absolute aim. I am even inclined to compare such moral aims to the ambitions of a pig.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I always cheer up immensely if an attack is particularly wounding because I think, well, if they attack one personally, it means they have not a single political argument left.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Wishing you blessings of health, happiness and success on Thanksgiving and always
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness is a positive cash flow.
author: Fred Adler

quote: Negativity is a thief, it steals happiness
author: Happiness

quote: Most people are about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Happiness is the only good. The time to be happy is now. The place to be happy is here. The way to be happy is to make others so.
author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A great obstacle to happiness is to expect too much happiness.
author: Bernard Le Bovier Fontenelle

quote: Some people will try to spoil your happiness just because they have nothing better to do and because they are unhappy with their own life... Stand your ground!
author: Happiness

quote: Where there is joy there is creation. Where there is no joy there is no creation: know the nature of joy.
author: Veda Upanishads

quote: Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The greatest joy of life is to love and be loved.
author: R.D. Clyde

quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I firmly believe, notwithstanding all our complaints, that almost every person upon earth tastes upon the totality more happiness than misery.
author: Horace Walpole

quote: Ah, happiness courts the light so we deem the world is gay. But misery hides aloof so we deem that misery there is none.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Happiness is not a reward it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment it is a result.
author: Happiness

quote: We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The amount of happiness that you have depends on the amount of freedom you have in your heart.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: We must dare to be happy, and dare to confess it, regarding ourselves always as the depositories, not as the authors of our own joy.
author: Henri Frédéric Amiel

quote: Unbroken happiness is a bore: It should have ups and downs.
author: Moliere

quote: Life is too short to spend time with people who suck the happiness out of you.
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness was born a twin.
author: Lord Byron

quote: How simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. . . . All that is required to feel that here and now is happiness is a simple, frugal heart.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Happiness is not a possession to be prized, it is a quality of thought, a state of mind.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: If you find serenity and happiness, they may be jealous, Be happy anyway.
author: Happiness

quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: If you cant be a PENCIL to write someones happiness, then try to be an ERASER to remove someones sadness
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness is unrepentant pleasure.
author: Socrates

quote: Unquestionably, it is possible to do without happiness; it is done involuntarily by nineteen-twentieths of mankind.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Let no man be called happy before his death. Till then, he is not happy, only lucky.
author: Solon

quote: Happiness is the settling of the soul into its most appropriate spot.
author: Aristotle

quote: The secret of Happiness is Freedom, and the secret of Freedom, Courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: Happiness is not about getting what you want all the time, its about appreciating what you already have.
author: Happiness

quote: Call no man unhappy until he is married.
author: Socrates

quote: I am determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation I may find myself. For I have learned that the greater part of our misery or unhappiness is determined not by our circumstance but by our disposition.
author: Martha Washington

quote: To be free minded and cheerfully disposed at hours of meat and sleep and of exercise is one of the best precepts of long lasting.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Happiness is excitement that has found a settling down place, but there is always a little corner that keeps flapping around.
author: E.L. Konigsburg

quote: Appreciate all of the amazing things others can bring to your life, but dont depend on them for creating your happiness.
author: Happiness

quote: Be as you wish to seem.
author: Socrates

quote: No man should desire to be happy who is not at the same time holy. He should spend his efforts in seeking to know and do the will of God, leaving to Christ the matter of how happy he should be.
author: A. W. Tozer

quote: The high prize of life, the crowning glory of a man is to be born with a bias to some pursuit which finds him in employment and happiness-whether it be to make baskets, or broadswords, or canals, or statues, or songs.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty might bring happiness, but happiness always brings beauty
author: Happiness

quote: We are no longer happy as soon as we wish to be happier.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: To live we must conquer incessantly, we must have the courage to be happy.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Through every walk of pain, theres is always a step of happiness that awaits.
author: Happiness

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you want to be happy , be happiness is not something to find, its something to create.. create your own happiness
author: Happiness

quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content.
author: Helen Keller

quote: If we cannot live so as to be happy, let us so live as to deserve happiness.
author: Johann G. Fichte

quote: Happiness is like a sunbeam, which the least shadow intercepts, while adversity is often as the rain of spring.
author: Chinese Proverbs

quote: So of cheerfulness, or a good temper, the more it is spent, the more it remains.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness consists of three things; Someone to love, work to do, and a clear conscience.
author: Source Unknown

quote: Dont put the key to your happiness in someone elses pocket.
author: Happiness

quote: Happy are those who dream dreams and are willing to pay the price to make them come true.
author: Source Unknown

quote: Happiness is not hard to find. Its beside you, its in front of you, its at your back, its around you. Its just a matter of appreciation
author: Happiness

quote: We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements of life, when all that we need to make us really happy is something to be enthusiastic about.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: The richer you get, the more expensive happiness becomes.
author: Happiness

quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: James Barrie

quote: True happiness comes from within yourself, not from someone else. Stop searching, start living.
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness is the longing for repetition.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: We are happy when for everything inside us there is a corresponding something outside us.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: there is a time in everybodys life when you have to stop being scared and say what you want & need cause holding back only leaves you with regret & unhappiness!
author: Happiness

quote: Human felicity is produced not so much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen, as by little advantages that occur every day.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Give your life happiness and excitement, not tears and pain.
author: Happiness

quote: I do not understand what the man who is happy wants in order to be happier.
author: Cicero

quote: Profit is a by-product of work; happiness is its chief product.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Lots of people I know have bootlegged tapes of performances and if they play it I will be transported back sometimes with happiness, sometimes with horror.
author: Chris Bailey

quote: ...happiness is the highest good, being a realization and perfect practice of virtue, which some can attain, while others have little or none of it...
author: Aristotle

quote: everybody wants happiness nobody wants pain but you cant have a rainbow without a little rain
author: Author

quote: If one only wished to be happy, this could be easily accomplished; but we wish to be happier that other people, and this is always difficult, for we believe others to be happier than they are.
author: Charles Montesquieu

quote: Happiness is made not found. Everyone can make it if they want. ;)
author: Happiness

quote: Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it.
author: Jacques Prevert

quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Truth or happiness. Never both.
author: Happiness

quote: The key to happiness is your inner freedom, peace, and willingness to enjoy every moment of your life.
author: Happiness

quote: life is about learnin from the past trust in your feelings takin chances losing and finding happiness appreciating the memories and realizin that life goes on
author: Happiness

quote: The happy people are those who are producing something; the bored people are those who are consuming much and producing nothing.
author: William R. Inge

quote: I am still determined to be cheerful and happy, in whatever situation I may be; for I have also learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends upon our dispositions, and not upon our circumstances.
author: Martha Washington

quote: the key to happiness is to realize that you are in complete control of how happy you are
author: Happiness

quote: The highest happiness of man is to have probed what is knowable and quietly to revere what is unknowable.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: Our brightest blazes of gladness are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: But the struggles make you stronger and the changes make you wise... And happiness has its own way of taking its sweet time
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness is a journey, not a destination
author: Happiness

quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: Happiness is not pleasure, it is victory.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Happiness in this world, when it comes, comes incidentally. Make it the object of pursuit, and it leads us a wild-goose chase, and is never attained. Follow some other object, and very possibly we may find that we have caught happiness without dreaming of it.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others.
author: Martin Luther King

quote: The happier the moment the shorter.
author: Pliny The Elder

quote: Our happiness depends on the habit of mind we cultivate. So practice happy thinking every day. Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Happiness is a by product of an effort to make someone else happy.
author: Gretta Brooker Palmer

quote: The high prize of life, the crowning glory of a man is to be born with a bias to some pursuit which finds him in employment and happiness-whether it be to make baskets, or broadswords, or canals, or statues, or songs.

quote: Happiness in this world, when it comes, comes incidentally. Make it the object of pursuit, and it leads us a wild-goose chase, and is never attained. Follow some other object, and very possibly we may find that we have caught happiness without dreaming of it.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others.
author: Martin Luther King

quote: The happier the moment the shorter.
author: Pliny The Elder

quote: Our happiness depends on the habit of mind we cultivate. So practice happy thinking every day. Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Happiness is a by product of an effort to make someone else happy.
author: Gretta Brooker Palmer

quote: The high prize of life, the crowning glory of a man is to be born with a bias to some pursuit which finds him in employment and happiness-whether it be to make baskets, or broadswords, or canals, or statues, or songs.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty might bring happiness, but happiness always brings beauty
author: Happiness

quote: We are no longer happy as soon as we wish to be happier.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: To live we must conquer incessantly, we must have the courage to be happy.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Through every walk of pain, theres is always a step of happiness that awaits.
author: Happiness

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: If you want to be happy , be happiness is not something to find, its something to create.. create your own happiness
author: Happiness

quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content.
author: Helen Keller

quote: If we cannot live so as to be happy, let us so live as to deserve happiness.
author: Johann G. Fichte

quote: Happiness is like a sunbeam, which the least shadow intercepts, while adversity is often as the rain of spring.
author: Chinese Proverbs

quote: So of cheerfulness, or a good temper, the more it is spent, the more it remains.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Happiness consists of three things; Someone to love, work to do, and a clear conscience.
author: Source Unknown

quote: Dont put the key to your happiness in someone elses pocket.
author: Happiness

quote: Happy are those who dream dreams and are willing to pay the price to make them come true.
author: Source Unknown

quote: Happiness is not hard to find. Its beside you, its in front of you, its at your back, its around you. Its just a matter of appreciation
author: Happiness

quote: We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements of life, when all that we need to make us really happy is something to be enthusiastic about.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: The richer you get, the more expensive happiness becomes.
author: Happiness

quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: James Barrie

quote: True happiness comes from within yourself, not from someone else. Stop searching, start living.
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness is the longing for repetition.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: We are happy when for everything inside us there is a corresponding something outside us.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: there is a time in everybodys life when you have to stop being scared and say what you want & need cause holding back only leaves you with regret & unhappiness!
author: Happiness

quote: Human felicity is produced not so much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen, as by little advantages that occur every day.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Give your life happiness and excitement, not tears and pain.
author: Happiness

quote: I do not understand what the man who is happy wants in order to be happier.
author: Cicero

quote: Profit is a by-product of work; happiness is its chief product.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Lots of people I know have bootlegged tapes of performances and if they play it I will be transported back sometimes with happiness, sometimes with horror.
author: Chris Bailey

quote: ...happiness is the highest good, being a realization and perfect practice of virtue, which some can attain, while others have little or none of it...
author: Aristotle

quote: everybody wants happiness nobody wants pain but you cant have a rainbow without a little rain
author: Author

quote: If one only wished to be happy, this could be easily accomplished; but we wish to be happier that other people, and this is always difficult, for we believe others to be happier than they are.
author: Charles Montesquieu

quote: Happiness is made not found. Everyone can make it if they want. ;)
author: Happiness

quote: Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it.
author: Jacques Prevert

quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Truth or happiness. Never both.
author: Happiness

quote: The key to happiness is your inner freedom, peace, and willingness to enjoy every moment of your life.
author: Happiness

quote: life is about learnin from the past trust in your feelings takin chances losing and finding happiness appreciating the memories and realizin that life goes on
author: Happiness

quote: The happy people are those who are producing something; the bored people are those who are consuming much and producing nothing.
author: William R. Inge

quote: I am still determined to be cheerful and happy, in whatever situation I may be; for I have also learned from experience that the greater part of our happiness or misery depends upon our dispositions, and not upon our circumstances.
author: Martha Washington

quote: the key to happiness is to realize that you are in complete control of how happy you are
author: Happiness

quote: The highest happiness of man is to have probed what is knowable and quietly to revere what is unknowable.
author: Johann von Goethe

quote: Our brightest blazes of gladness are commonly kindled by unexpected sparks.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: But the struggles make you stronger and the changes make you wise... And happiness has its own way of taking its sweet time
author: Happiness

quote: Happiness is a journey, not a destination
author: Happiness

quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness.
author: Frederic Chopin

quote: Happiness is not pleasure, it is victory.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Happiness in this world, when it comes, comes incidentally. Make it the object of pursuit, and it leads us a wild-goose chase, and is never attained. Follow some other object, and very possibly we may find that we have caught happiness without dreaming of it.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Those who are not looking for happiness are the most likely to find it, because those who are searching forget that the surest way to be happy is to seek happiness for others.
author: Martin Luther King

quote: The happier the moment the shorter.
author: Pliny The Elder

quote: Our happiness depends on the habit of mind we cultivate. So practice happy thinking every day. Cultivate the merry heart, develop the happiness habit, and life will become a continual feast.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Happiness is a by product of an effort to make someone else happy.
author: Gretta Brooker Palmer
